original_title: The Best of Monty Python's Flying Circus Volume 2
overview: All the best sketches from the second series of the ground-breaking comedy. Memorable moments include: 'It's in the Mind'; 'The New Cooker Sketch'; 'Nobody Expects the Spanish Inquisition'; and 'The Ministry for Silly Walks'.  Originally Broadcast from 15 September to 22 December 1970
tagline: The Best of Monty Python's Flying Circus
title: The Best of Monty Python's Flying Circus Volume 2
